thread.title: BRIEF-Tufton Oceanic Assets Says Acquired Two Feeder Containerships For $20.5 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tufton Oceanic Assets Says Acquired Two Feeder Containerships For $20.5 Mln

organizations.name: brief-tufton oceanic assets says acquired two feeder containerships

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Tufton Oceanic Assets Ltd:
* ‍COMPANY HAS ACQUIRED TWO FEEDER CONTAINERSHIPS FOR $20.5 MILLION​
* ‍VESSELS ARE INITIALLY CHARTERED FOR 2-3 YEARS TO A MAJOR CONTAINER LINE WHICH IS INVESTMENT GRADE.​
* ‍INITIAL YIELD IS IN LINE WITH TARGETS EXPRESSED IN COMPANY‘S PROSPECTUS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
